channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
I just downloaded a new PI server but the client won't load, so I can't really see what to change inside the server. When I try to run the client it stops at "Requesting Title Screen" and the error that shows with it is:
################# Project Ecko Client V5.0 Thank You Kurdz ################# response:2 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string : "%1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unk nown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.drawHPOrb(client.java:303) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:12408) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10682) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11622) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:173) at client.run(client.java:6396) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Please help, I really like this server and would love to log in and start coding.

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

What about it? Its all in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

I just downloaded a new PI server but the client won’t load, so I can’t really see what to change inside the server.
When I try to run the client it stops at “Requesting Title Screen” and the error that shows with it is:

#################
Project Ecko Client V5.0
Thank You Kurdz
#################
response:2
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
Exception in thread “Thread-6” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string
: “%1”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unk nown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at client.drawHPOrb(client.java:303)
at client.drawMinimap(client.java:12408)
at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10682)
at client.processDrawing(client.java:11622)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:173)
at client.run(client.java:6396)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Please help, I really like this server and would love to log in and start coding.

Read full topic
